files.patch:
@@ -25,12 +25,12 @@
-# osname-architecture mapped to their endianness
-aix-ppc64=big
-linux-aarch64=little
-linux-arm=little
-linux-amd64=little
-linux-ppc64le=little
-linux-s390x=big
-linux-x86=little
-macos-aarch64=little
-macos-amd64=little
-windows-amd64=little
-windows-x86=little
+# <osname-architecture>.endianness mapped to their endianness
+aix-ppc64.endianness=big
+linux-aarch64.endianness=little
+linux-arm.endianness=little
+linux-amd64.endianness=little
+linux-ppc64le.endianness=little
+linux-s390x.endianness=big
+linux-x86.endianness=little
+macos-aarch64.endianness=little
+macos-amd64.endianness=little
+windows-amd64.endianness=little
+windows-x86.endianness=little
